targets.query: SELECT (last("GS_room_temperature")-last("GS_room_setpoint")) FROM "autogen"."uponor" WHERE ("bereich" = 'GS_Studio-WoZi') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (last("GS_room_temperature")-last("GS_room_setpoint")) FROM "autogen"."uponor" WHERE ("bereich" = 'GS_Studio-Kueche') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (last("GS_room_temperature")-last("GS_room_setpoint")) FROM "autogen"."uponor" WHERE ("bereich" = 'GS_Studio-Bad') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
